Whatâ€™s this, you ask? Collusion between manufacturers? No, not quite, and technically MSRPs are the same as anywhere else, but Connecticut offers its residents $3,000 cash-on-the-hood rebates for these cars at the time of sale, thus making them that much cheaper.
